effects: Cure Poison, Blind, Sleep, Silence, Paralyze and Confusion for all allies
name: I'll heal you all!
I'll heal you all!
我將治療大家！
다들 내가 고쳐줄게!
Je vais tous vous soigner !
Ich heile euch alle!
¡Chicos, ahora os curo!
desc_short: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, and confusion for all allies
治療全體隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂狀態
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란 회복
Soigne tous les alliés de poison, cécité, sommeil, paralysie, confusion
Heilt Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung und Konfus aller Verb.
Recupera VIT y cura a todos los aliados ven, ceg, sue, sil, par y conf
